channel.title: Small Prob... Would apreciate help ~~ =)
channel.description:
Aite... I've read a tut for the "190" arrow fix (When you log in, it sets your arrows to 190, no matter what the amount equipped )... Okay, i searched this.. [code] setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerArrows],190,playerArrows); [/code] Then, changed the 190, to 0 [code] setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerArrows],0,playerArrows); [/code] When i logged in, with 500 arrows equipped, it gave me 0 arrows.. (Lol) so i added this [code] if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] != -1 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != -1) [/code] Tried in lots of places, still can't get it to work..
Any ideas?
Apreciated, thx

item.title: Small Prob... Would apreciate help ~~ =)
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Aite… I’ve read a tut for the “190” arrow fix (When you log in, it sets your arrows to 190, no matter what the amount equipped )… Okay, i searched this…

		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerArrows],190,playerArrows);

Then, changed the 190, to 0

		setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerArrows],0,playerArrows);

When i logged in, with 500 arrows equipped, it gave me 0 arrows… (Lol) so i added this

if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] != -1 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != -1)

Tried in lots of places, still can’t get it to work…

Any ideas?

Apreciated, thx

Read full topic
